mapper.sql: select id, user_id, user_type, rolling_funds, deductible_commission, deposit, freeze, business_balance, refer_balance, card_balance_detail, business_balance_diff, refer_balance_diff, remark, date_time from alipay_statement
mapper.select:
select auf.userId as user_id , auf.userType as user_type , IFNULL(auf.accountBalance, 0) as rolling_funds, IFNULL(auf.sumProfit, 0) as deductible_commission, IFNULL(auf.deposit, 0) as deposit, IFNULL(auf.freezeBalance, 0) as freeze, IFNULL(am.toDayDeal, 0) as business_balance, IFNULL(am.mountNow, 0) as refer_balance, '' as card_balance_detail, IFNULL(auf.accountBalance, 0) + IFNULL(am.toDayDeal, 0) - IFNULL(auf.deposit, 0) as business_balance_diff, IFNULL(auf.accountBalance, 0) + IFNULL(am.mountNow, 0) - IFNULL(auf.deposit, 0) as refer_balance_diff, NOW() as date_time
from alipay_user_fund auf left join ( select SUM(mountNow) as mountNow , sum( toDayDeal - toDayWit + yseToday ) as toDayDeal , qrcodeId from alipay_medium where isDeal = '2' group by qrcodeId ) as am on auf.userId = am.qrcodeId where auf.userType ='2' and (auf.todayWitAmount >0 or auf.todayDealAmount >0)
mapper.insert:
insert into alipay_statement
user_id, user_type, rolling_funds, deductible_commission, deposit, freeze, business_balance, refer_balance, card_balance_detail, business_balance_diff, refer_balance_diff, remark, date_time,
#{userId}, #{userType}, #{rollingFunds}, #{deductibleCommission}, #{deposit}, #{freeze}, #{businessBalance}, #{referBalance}, #{cardBalanceDetail}, #{businessBalanceDiff}, #{referBalanceDiff}, #{remark}, #{dateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from alipay_statement where id in
#{id}
